verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his wife is ' doing great ' nearly two weeks after her kidney treatment] . Trump answered a reporter 's question about the first lady as he departed the White House .
President Donald Trump says his wife [V: is] ' doing great ' nearly two weeks after her kidney treatment . Trump answered a reporter 's question about the first lady as he departed the White House .

President Donald Trump says [ARG0: his wife] is ' [V: doing] [ARGM-MNR: great] ' [ARGM-TMP: nearly two weeks after her kidney treatment] . Trump answered a reporter 's question about the first lady as he departed the White House .

President Donald Trump says his wife is ' doing great ' nearly two weeks after her kidney treatment . [ARG0: Trump] [V: answered] [ARG1: a reporter 's question about the first lady] [ARGM-TMP: as he departed the White House] .

President Donald Trump says his wife is ' doing great ' nearly two weeks after her kidney treatment . Trump answered a reporter 's question about the first lady as [ARG0: he] [V: departed] [ARG1: the White House] .
